title: AppSyc to DynamoDB
description: Create an AWS AppSync api endpoint with a resolver to Amazon DynamoDB

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The SAM template deploys an AppSync api, a DynamoDB table, a GraphQL schema and multiple resolvers to the DynamoDB table.

author.headline: Presented by Eric Johnson, Developer Advocate
author.name: Eric Johnson
author.bio: Eric is a Principal Developer Advocate for Serverless Applications at Amazon Web Services and is based in Northern Colorado. Eric is a fanatic about serverless and enjoys helping developers understand how serverless technologies introduces a major paradigm shift in how they approach building and running applications at massive scale with minimal administration overhead. Prior to this, Eric has worked as a developer, solutions architect and AWS Evangelist for an AWS partner company.
